techmeme.title: US insurance giant Allianz Life says hackers stole the personal information of the "majority" of its customers, staffers, and employees, in a mid-July breach (Zack Whittaker/TechCrunch)

Google has defended Search against the first wave of disruption from generative AI, but AI agents and apps that can reduce clicks now threaten its ad business (Richard Waters/Financial Times)
Christina Marie Chapman, who pleaded guilty and was sentenced to prison for aiding a North Korean remote IT worker scheme, details her time as a "laptop farmer" (Evan Ratliff/Bloomberg)
